children.name: info-origin-Alien
children.label: Information
children.text: The character is not human and probaably not from Earth or at least Earth-616. The Marvel Multiverse features all sorts of different alien races. The most common of these - Kree, Skrulls, and so on - have their own entries. If the character doesn't fit on of those, the this origin applies.

children.name: info-origin-Alien-Kree
children.label: Information
children.text:
The character is a member of the Kree, a humanoid race from the planet Hala who formed the interstellar Kree Empire in the region of space known as the Large Magellanic Cloud. They resemble humans but are stronger and tougher. Many of them have blue skin, but a good number of them have pink skin.
The air on Hala has much more nitrogen in it, and Kree who are raised in it (or something like it) have a hard time breathing the air on Earth.

children.name: info-origin-Alien-Shi'ar
children.label: Information
children.text: The character is a member of the Shi'ar, an avian humanoid race from the planet Chandilar who formed the interstellar Shi'ar Empire in the Shi'ar Galaxy. They resemble humand but are much stronger and have feathers instead of hair on their heads.

children.name: info-origin-Alien-Skrull
children.label: Information
children.text:
The character is a member of the Skrull, a reptilian humanoid race of shape-shifters who formed the interstellar Skrull Empire. In their natural form, they have green skin, red or green eyes, pointed ears and fullowed chins. They sprang from the planet Skrullos in the Andromeda Galaxy.
The original Skrulls could not shape-shift, but the Celestials experimented on them to form Eternal Skrulls and Deviant Skrulls, much like they did with humans on Earth. The Deviant Skrulls became the dominant form of the species, driving the originals to extinction.

children.name: info-origin-Atlantean
children.label: Information
children.text:
The character is a member Homo mermanus, a variant race of humanity. Atlanteans breathe water through gills on both sides of their neck, and they cannot breathe air for longer than ten minutes.
If they live in the Atlantic Ocean, they likely have blue skin and hail from Atlantis. If they come from the Pacific Ocean, they likely have green skin and live in Lemuria.

children.name: info-origin-Deviant
children.label: Information
children.text:
The character is a member of Homo descendus, a variant race of humanity created by the Celestials. They are scattered across Earth, but they mainly live in underground cities beneath the Pacific Ocean, close to Lemuria.
Only one hundred Deviants were originally created, but many more have been born over the millenia since then. They vary a great deal physically, coming in all sizes, shapes, colors and textures. Each is born with a unique physical mutation, and they have the latent genetic ability to develop powers, much like mutants.
Eternals are compelled to kill Deviant mutates as part of their principle 'Correct excess deviation.'

children.name: info-origin-Eternal
children.label: Information
children.text:
The character is a member of Homo immortalis, a variant race of humanity created by the Celestials. They are scattered across Earth, but their headquarters lies in the city of Olympia, high in the mountains in Greece and folded into an echo dimension. Some live on Titan (a moon of Saturn) instead.
The Eternals live by three principles:
  • Protect Celestials.
  • Protect the Machine (a sentient AI deeply connected with the Earth).
  • Correct excess deviation.

Only one hundred Eternals were originally created, and only two have been born since: Thanos and Eros. The character is either one of the lesser-known one hundred or a new Eternal brought to life through extraordinary means.
Through a ritual usually initiated by the Prime Eternal (their official leader), Eternals can be called to be part of a collective being known as the Uni-Mind.

children.name: info-origin-God
children.label: Information
children.text: The character is a god (of a sort) and has access to powers that come with their heritage.

children.name: info-origin-High Tech
children.label: Information
children.text: The character's powers arise from high-tech devices that are well beyond the limits of modern-day engineering. This can come in many forms.

children.name: info-origin-High Tech-Android
children.label: Information
children.text: The character is an artificial person. Their body (when they have one) is made of plastic, metal and circuitry rather than flesh and blood. Their powers come from techology embedded in their artificial body.

children.name: info-origin-High Tech-Battle Suit
children.label: Information
children.text:
The character wears a high-tech suit that grants them powers. When the battle suit is removed, the character no longer has access to the powers it grants. They are entirely - or at least mostly - normal underneath.
Most characters with this origin have the Extreme Appearance tag when wearing their battle suit.

children.name: info-origin-High Tech-Cybernetics
children.label: Information
children.text:
The character has high-tech, surgically embedded implants that grant them powers. These cannot be removed without great care or pain.
If the implants are obious, the character gets the Extreme Appearance tage. Otherwise, the implants have been hidden inside their body (as with the lacing of Wolverine's skeleton with adamantium) and might be visible only when in use (like when Wolverine uses his claws), if then.

children.name: info-origin-High Tech-Pym Particles
children.label: Information
children.text:
The character uses Pym Particles (named after their inventor, Henry Pym) to dramatically grow or shrink in size.
After long-enough exposure to Pym Particles, many people are able to generate such particles on their own without the need of external aid. They may still need to use extra Pym Particles to reach extremely large or small sizes.

children.name: info-origin-Inhuman
children.label: Information
children.text:
The character is a member of Homo sapiens inhumanas, a variant race of humanity genetically engineered by the Kree. For millennia, they lived isolated from the world, but they emerged in recent years, led by Black Bolt.
All Inhumans carry a latent gene that can be activated by the Terrigen Mist. The explosion of a Terrigen Bomb spread the mist across the entrie planet, revealing that many humans (including Kamala Khan) had Inhuman genetics. Black Bolt was later forced to destroy the Inhumans, leaving few outside of the royal family alive.
The character is one of those rare Inhumans whow survived.

children.name: info-origin-Magic
children.label: Information
children.text: The character's powers arise from supernatural means. There are many different traditions within magic, each with their own teachings.

children.name: info-origin-Magic-Chaos Magic
children.label: Information
children.text: The character is able to use chaos magic, which allows them to bend reality to their will. It stems from the ancient got Chthon.

children.name: info-origin-Magic-Demonic
children.label: Information
children.text: The character taps into (or is cursed by) the powers of Hell. They may be a native of one of the Nine Circles of Hell, or their powers might simply come from a Hellish source.

children.name: info-origin-Magic-Sorcery
children.label: Information
children.text: The character's powers arise from the study and practice of sorcery.

children.name: info-origin-Monstrous
children.label: Information
children.text: The character is some kind of monster. They may have a human form - or may have once been human - but they get their powers from their unnatural monstrousness.

children.name: info-origin-Monstrous-Dhampir
children.label: Information
children.text: The character was once alive but was embraced by a vampire and has risen from death as a vampire, but became a dhampir. Dhampir is a term used to refer to individuals born of a union between a human and a vampire or had their vampirism halted, basically human-vampire hybrids.

children.name: info-origin-Monstrous-Vampire
children.label: Information
children.text:
The character was once alive but was embraced by a vampire and has risen from death as a vampire too. They can transmit this magical disease to victims of their choosing.
When a character becomes a vampire, they go up one rank and gain the listed tags, traits, and powers. They do not gain any additional powers or traits from this bump in rank, but they do gain 5 ability points and add +1 to their damage multiplier. If they have the Heroic tag, they also add 1 to their Karma.

children.name: info-origin-Monstrous-Werewolf
children.label: Information
children.text:
The character is afflicted with lycanthropy, a magical disease that causes them to take on the shape of a werewolf during the three nights of the full moon. They can transmit this magical disease to victims of their choosing who survive their attacks.
When a character becomes a werewolf, they gain the Lunar Transformation and Alternate Form tags. Whe the character takes on their werewolf form, they go up one rank and gain the rest of the listed tags, traits, and powers. They do not gain any additional powers or traits from this bump in rank, but they do gain 5 ability points and add +1 to their damage multiplier. If they have the Heroic tag, they also add 1 to their Karma.
When they return to human form, they lose the benefits of their werewolf form.
They character can switch forms voluntarily at any point - except during the three nights the the moon is at its fullest. On those nights, while the moon is above the horizon, the character must transform into a werewolf and is ruled by their animal nature. They cannot help but hunt and attack any people or creatures they come across, no matter if they are friend or foe.

children.name: info-origin-Mutant
children.label: Information
children.text: The character's powers spring from them being a member of the subspecies Homo superior. They have a latent X-Gene that grants them powers, often triggered at adolescence.

children.name: info-origin-Mutant-X-men '97
children.label: Information
children.text: The character's powers spring from them being a member of the subspecies Homo superior.

children.name: info-origin-Mythic
children.label: Information
children.text: The character is a creature or person of myth and legend. While they may appear human, they are something else.

children.name: info-origin-Mythic-Asgardian
children.label: Information
children.text:
The character is a member of the Asgardian people, resembling the Norse gods. They call Asgard their home.
The character can be one of the many gods who have been named throughout history, or they can be one of the lesser-known gods of Asgard. They should choose something that they are the god of.

children.name: info-origin-Mythic-Olympian
children.label: Information
children.text:
The character is a member of the Olympian people, resembling the gods of Ancient Greece and Rome. They call Olympus their home.
They character can be one of the many gods who have been named throughout history, or they can be one of the lesser-known gods of Olympus. They should choose something that they are the god of.

children.name: info-origin-Special Training
children.label: Information
children.text: The character's powers come from long hours of practice. Their intense focus grants them abilities that would astonish most people. Powers are limited to those that do not provide superhuman abilities.

children.name: info-origin-Spirit of Vengeance
children.label: Information
children.text:
The character has been possessed by a Spirit of Vengeance. Their purpose is to find sinners and impose penance.
When a character becomes possessed by a Spirit of Vengeance, they gain the Alternate Form tag, which they can use voluntarily at any point. When the character takes on their Ghost Rider form, they gain access to the listed tags, traits, and powers. When they return to human form, they lose the benefits of their Ghost Rider form.

children.name: info-origin-Symbiote
children.label: Information
children.text:
The character has bonded with one of the Klyntar, a race of alien symbiotes created by the alien god Knull. Most of these creatures on Earth display spiderlike powers.
When a character bonds with a symbiote, they go up one rank and gain the listed tags, traits, and powers. Any remaining powers they select are often from the Spider-Powers set but do not have to be. Many symbiotes have the Disguise power.
If the symbiote is Venom or one of its progeny, Spider-Man (Peter Parker) cannot gain any benefits from his Spider-Sense power against the bonded character.

children.name: info-origin-Unknown
children.label: Information
children.text:
The character has developed powers but is not entirely sure how. It could be that the player or the Narrator knows, but the character does not, or maybe nobody else does either. Astonishing things happen all the time in the Marvel Multiverse, and there's no way to classify them all.
The source of the powers may be explained in time. It could turn out that the character actually has a standard type of origin, or it could be that they have an origin that's utterly unique.

children.name: info-origin-Weird Science
children.label: Information
children.text:
The character's powers arose from a scientific experiment of accident that's hard - if not impossible - to reproduce. Often, they had the latent genetic potential to develop powers and were somehow exposed to the right triggers - which would have likely killed most other people.
These kinds of character are sometimes call mutates. The difference between a mutate and a mutant is that a mutant's powers come to them naturally, but a mutate's powers require a triggering incident that might never happen. In this sense, Inhumans are all mutates who share a gene with a known rigger: the Terrigen Mist.

children.name: info-origin-Weird Science-Gamma Mutate
children.label: Information
children.text: The character has a genetic mutation that gave them powers once they were exposed to enough gamma radiation, transforming them physically. This often gives them a monstrous appearance and changes their coloration drastically, usually to green, although some become red or even blue. They can often transorm back into their original form as well.

children.name: info-occupation-Adventurer
children.label: Information
children.text: The character focuses on having adventures.

children.name: info-occupation-Assassin
children.label: Information
children.text: The character is a hired killer.

children.name: info-occupation-Criminal
children.label: Information
children.text: The character did something that put them on the wrong side of the law.

children.name: info-occupation-Educator
children.label: Information
children.text: The character educates others.

children.name: info-occupation-Engineer
children.label: Information
children.text: The character designs and builds things to solve problems.

children.name: info-occupation-Entertainer
children.label: Information
children.text: The character entertains others for a living.

children.name: info-occupation-Health Care Worker
children.label: Information
children.text: The character is a doctor, nurse, therapist or other person dedicated to helping heal others.

children.name: info-occupation-Investigator
children.label: Information
children.text: The character is trained to solve mysteries.

children.name: info-occupation-Journalist
children.label: Information
children.text: The character works as a reporter or editor for a news organization.

children.name: info-occupation-Law Enforcer
children.label: Information
children.text: The character works as a law enforcement officer.

children.name: info-occupation-Lawyer
children.label: Information
children.text: The character has a law degree and knows how to use it.

children.name: info-occupation-Leader
children.label: Information
children.text: The character is the leader of a city, region, state or nation.

children.name: info-occupation-Military
children.label: Information
children.text: The character serves (or at least once served) in a military organization and relies on that training.

children.name: info-occupation-Outsider
children.label: Information
children.text: The character comes from another planet, dimension or time and is not familiar with how things work on this Earth.

children.name: info-occupation-Ruler
children.label: Information
children.text: The character is the leader of a city, region, state, or nation.

children.name: info-occupation-Scientist
children.label: Information
children.text: The character solves problems by means of scientific research.

children.name: info-occupation-Soldier
children.label: Information
children.text: The character served in a military organization.

children.name: info-occupation-Spy
children.label: Information
children.text: The character is an expert in espionage.

children.name: info-occupation-Student
children.label: Information
children.text: The character attends school or college on a full-time basis.

children.name: info-occupation-Tycoon
children.label: Information
children.text: The character is wildly wealthy and well-known.

children.name: info-trait-Abrasive
children.label: Information
children.text: The character rubs people the wrong way.

children.name: info-trait-Anathema
children.label: Information
children.text: The character suffers direct harm when exposed to a particular substance.

children.name: info-trait-Audience
children.label: Information
children.text: Many people follow the character's work and treat them with the respect they deserve.

children.name: info-trait-Battle Ready
children.label: Information
children.text: The character is always mentally prepared for any sort of trouble to start.

children.name: info-trait-Beguiling
children.label: Information
children.text: The character has an edge when making an Ego check to persuade someone who could be attracted to them.

children.name: info-trait-Berserker
children.label: Information
children.text: The character often loses control of their temper.

children.name: info-trait-Big
children.label: Information
children.text: The character's size is big, which applies -1 to their Melee and Agility defenses, adds +1 to their Run Speed, and increases their reach to 2.

children.name: info-trait-Bloodthirsty
children.label: Information
children.text: The character likes hurting peopleeven killing them.

children.name: info-trait-Breathe Different
children.label: Information
children.text: The character cannot breathe Earth's air for long.

children.name: info-trait-Clinician
children.label: Information
children.text: The character has an edge on Logic (medicine) checks to determine what is medically wrong with someone they examine.

children.name: info-trait-Clueless
children.label: Information
children.text: The character tends to shut out things they're not entirely focused on.

children.name: info-trait-Combat Expert
children.label: Information
children.text: The character knows how to handle themselves better than most.

children.name: info-trait-Combat Finesse
children.label: Information
children.text: The character can add their Agility rather than their Melee to Fight attack checks.

children.name: info-trait-Combat Reflexes
children.label: Information
children.text: The character can react quickly in combat.

children.name: info-trait-Combat Trickery
children.label: Information
children.text: Once per battle, when attacking, the character can turn the Marvel die into a 1.

children.name: info-trait-Connections
children.label: Information
children.text: The character knows someone with access to and knowledge of a particular field.

children.name: info-trait-Dealmaker
children.label: Information
children.text: The character is skilled at the art of negotiation.

children.name: info-trait-Debate Champ
children.label: Information
children.text: The character can use their Logic instead of their Ego with Ego (persuasion) and Ego (intimidation) checks.

children.name: info-trait-Determination
children.label: Information
children.text: The character never gives up, even when they feel like they're at their worst.

children.name: info-trait-Eidetic Memory
children.label: Information
children.text: The character rarely forgets anything.

children.name: info-trait-Enduring Constitution
children.label: Information
children.text: The character can function for up to 48 hours without sleep and has an edge on Resilience checks to overcome fatigue or weariness.

children.name: info-trait-Enhanced Physique
children.label: Information
children.text: The character is stronger than regular humans.

children.name: info-trait-Extra Occupation
children.label: Information
children.text: The character has a busy life and has done all sorts of things.

children.name: info-trait-Extraordinary Origin
children.label: Information
children.text: The character has an additional origin.

children.name: info-trait-Famous
children.label: Information
children.text: The character is widely knownat least among a certain group of people or a population.

children.name: info-trait-Fearless
children.label: Information
children.text: The character is extremely brave.

children.name: info-trait-First Aid
children.label: Information
children.text: The character knows how to administer first aid.

children.name: info-trait-Font of Information
children.label: Information
children.text: The character has an edge on Logic checks having to do with knowledge.

children.name: info-trait-Free Running
children.label: Information
children.text: The character has an edge on Agility checks made to perform acrobatics during a movement action.

children.name: info-trait-Fresh Eyes
children.label: Information
children.text: The character has their own way of doing things.

children.name: info-trait-Gearhead
children.label: Information
children.text: The character knows their way around machines.

children.name: info-trait-Glibness
children.label: Information
children.text: The character can strike up a conversation with anyone at any time and can often convince them to lend a hand.

children.name: info-trait-God Heritage
children.label: Information
children.text: The character - or at least one of their ancestors - is a god.

children.name: info-trait-Gullible
children.label: Information
children.text: The character is easy to fool.

children.name: info-trait-Honest
children.label: Information
children.text: The character is a terrible liar.

children.name: info-trait-Infamous
children.label: Information
children.text: The character is widely known and generally dislikedat least among a certain group of people or a population.

children.name: info-trait-Interrogation
children.label: Information
children.text: The character knows how to ask the right questions in the right way.

children.name: info-trait-Inventor
children.label: Information
children.text: The character is good at coming up with solutions on the fly.

children.name: info-trait-Investigation
children.label: Information
children.text: The character is an expert investigator, trained in the arts of forensic science.

children.name: info-trait-Iron Will
children.label: Information
children.text: Enemies have trouble on attacks to control the character's mind or influence their behavior.

children.name: info-trait-Legal Eagle
children.label: Information
children.text: The character knows the laws of their homeland and can help others navigate them.

children.name: info-trait-Leverage
children.label: Information
children.text: The character is good at figuring out what people want and using it against them.

children.name: info-trait-Loner
children.label: Information
children.text: The character does not play well with others.

children.name: info-trait-Massive
children.label: Information
children.text: The character's size is Big.

children.name: info-trait-Monster
children.label: Information
children.text: The character is some kind of monster, often of a type spoken of in legend.

children.name: info-trait-Out of Shape
children.label: Information
children.text: The character is in poor physical condition.

children.name: info-trait-Piloting
children.label: Information
children.text: The character knows how to operate vehicles of all kinds.

children.name: info-trait-Presence
children.label: Information
children.text: The character knows how to command attention on demand.

children.name: info-trait-Public Speaking
children.label: Information
children.text: The character knows how to get the attention of a crowd, whether that's at a political rally or in front of a jury or a classroom.

children.name: info-trait-Pundit
children.label: Information
children.text: The character knows how to break news items and put them into context to craft a story around them.

children.name: info-trait-Quick Learner
children.label: Information
children.text: If the character fails an action check, they gain an edge on the check if they try the same action again on their next turn.

children.name: info-trait-Regal
children.label: Information
children.text: The character seems born to be in charge.

children.name: info-trait-Scientific Expertise
children.label: Information
children.text: The character has extensive scientific training.

children.name: info-trait-Signature Attack
children.label: Information
children.text: The character is known for favoring a particular kind of weapon or attack power.

children.name: info-trait-Situational Awareness
children.label: Information
children.text: The character is trained to always keep an eye out for trouble.

children.name: info-trait-Skeptical
children.label: Information
children.text: The character is hard to fool.

children.name: info-trait-Small
children.label: Information
children.text: The character's size is small, which adds +1 to their Melee and Agility defenses and takes -1 from their Run Speed.

children.name: info-trait-Sneaky
children.label: Information
children.text: The character has an edge on Agility checks when sneaking around.

children.name: info-trait-Stranger
children.label: Information
children.text: The character doesn't understand local customs.

children.name: info-trait-Surprising Power
children.label: Information
children.text: The character can choose a power they normally wouldn't be able to use.

children.name: info-trait-Tech Reliance
children.label: Information
children.text: The character relies on technology for powers.

children.name: info-trait-Weakness
children.label: Information
children.text: The character suffers an unusual amount of harm from certain substances.

children.name: info-trait-Weird
children.label: Information
children.text: The character has something weird (or even wonderful) about them.

text.name: info-power-Basic-Accuracy 1
text.label: Information
text.text: The character is an ace with ranged weapons.

text.name: info-power-Basic-Accuracy 2
text.label: Information
text.text: The character is a sharpshooter.

text.name: info-power-Basic-Accuracy 3
text.label: Information
text.text: The character could hit a fly at one hundred paces.

text.name: info-power-Basic-Accuracy 4
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can out-target almost anyone.

text.name: info-power-Basic-Additional Limbs
text.label: Information
text.text: The character has extra limbs that can grab objects and attack foes.

text.name: info-power-Basic-Anger
text.label: Information
text.text: You won''t like them when they're angry.

text.name: info-power-Basic-Brawling
text.label: Information
text.text: The character has the moves and is hard to hit.

text.name: info-power-Basic-Brilliance 1
text.label: Information
text.text: The character puts their brain to work.

text.name: info-power-Basic-Brilliance 2
text.label: Information
text.text: The character puts their brain to work.

text.name: info-power-Basic-Brilliance 3
text.label: Information
text.text: Little can stop the character's mind.

text.name: info-power-Basic-Brilliance 4
text.label: Information
text.text: The character''s intelligence is unparalleled.

text.name: info-power-Basic-Camouflage
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can blend into the background to avoid detection.

text.name: info-power-Basic-Combat Trickery
text.label: Information
text.text: The character is a tricky one!

text.name: info-power-Basic-Discipline 1
text.label: Information
text.text: The character works to hone their power.

text.name: info-power-Basic-Discipline 2
text.label: Information
text.text: The character is more in touch with their power than ever.

text.name: info-power-Basic-Discipline 3
text.label: Information
text.text: Few can top the character's grasp on their power.

text.name: info-power-Basic-Discipline 4
text.label: Information
text.text: The character has mastered their power.

text.name: info-power-Basic-Disguise
text.label: Information
text.text: The character appears to be someone else.

text.name: info-power-Basic-Energy Absorption
text.label: Information
text.text: The character turns damage into power.

text.name: info-power-Basic-Environmental Protection
text.label: Information
text.text: Environmental effects don''t bother the character.

text.name: info-power-Basic-Evasion
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can dodge fists quickly.

text.name: info-power-Basic-Fastball Special
text.label: Information
text.text: Your ally tosses you straight into the heart of the battle!

text.name: info-power-Basic-Flight 1
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can soar into the sky.

text.name: info-power-Basic-Flight 2
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can zoom across the sky.

text.name: info-power-Basic-Group Flight
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can carry others with them into the sky.

text.name: info-power-Basic-Healing Factor
text.label: Information
text.text: The character heals amazingly fast.

text.name: info-power-Basic-Heightened Senses 1
text.label: Information
text.text: The character has superior senses.

text.name: info-power-Basic-Heightened Senses 2
text.label: Information
text.text: The character has senses as sharp as radar.

text.name: info-power-Basic-Iconic Weapon
text.label: Information
text.text: The character is known for owning and using a unique and powerful weapon

text.name: info-power-Basic-Inspiration
text.label: Information
text.text: The character's words inspire their allies.

text.name: info-power-Basic-Integrity
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can think their way through.

text.name: info-power-Basic-Mighty 1
text.label: Information
text.text: The character is superhumanly strong.

text.name: info-power-Basic-Mighty 2
text.label: Information
text.text: The character could lift a bus.

text.name: info-power-Basic-Mighty 3
text.label: Information
text.text: The character could lift a house.

text.text: The character exudes pheromones that affect those nearby.

text.name: info-power-Spider Powers-Spider-Sense
text.label: Information
text.text: The character has a sense of danger that tingles when threats are near.

text.name: info-power-Spider Powers-Spider-Strike
text.label: Information
text.text: The character has a sense of danger that tingles when threats are near.

text.name: info-power-Spider Powers-Venom Blast
text.label: Information
text.text: The character unleashes a bioelectric shock.

text.name: info-power-Spider Powers-Wallcrawling
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can snare a target in a web.

text.name: info-power-Spider Powers-Webcasting
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can snare a target in a web.

text.name: info-power-Spider Powers-Webgliding
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can glide through the air on their webbing.

text.name: info-power-Spider Powers-Webgrabbing
text.label: Information
text.text: The character snares a foe in a web.

text.name: info-power-Spider Powers-Webslinging
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can swing through the city on their webs.

text.name: info-power-Spider Powers-Webtrapping
text.label: Information
text.text: The character creates a giant web to trap those within it.

text.name: info-power-Super Speed-Blazing-Fast Fists
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can attack superfast.

text.name: info-power-Super Speed-Blur
text.label: Information
text.text: The character moves like a blur!

text.name: info-power-Super Speed-Catch Bullets
text.label: Information
text.text: The character is fast enough to catch bullets-safely!

text.name: info-power-Super Speed-Lightning Actions
text.label: Information
text.text: The character has lightning-fast moves.

text.name: info-power-Super Speed-Molecular Destabilization
text.label: Information
text.text: The character causes something to vibrate fast enough to explode.

text.name: info-power-Super Speed-Run On Water
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can run across water.

text.name: info-power-Super Speed-Speed Blast
text.label: Information
text.text: The character fans their arms fast enough to blast a target with a gust of air!

text.name: info-power-Super Speed-Speed Run 1
text.label: Information
text.text: The character runs as fast as a car!

text.name: info-power-Super Speed-Speed Run 2
text.label: Information
text.text: The character runs as fast as a jet!

text.name: info-power-Super Speed-Speed Swim
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can swim faster than a dolphin!

text.name: info-power-Super Strength-Crushing Grip
text.label: Information
text.text: The character seizes an enemy and squeezes hard.

text.name: info-power-Super Strength-Immovable
text.label: Information
text.text: Nobody pushes the character around.

text.name: info-power-Super Strength-Jump 1
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can leap about like a frog.

text.name: info-power-Super Strength-Jump 2
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can leap around with dazzling speed.

text.name: info-power-Super Strength-Jump 3
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can leap into the sky with a single bound.

text.name: info-power-Super Strength-Banging Heads
text.label: Information
text.text: The character takes two nearby enemies and slams their heads into each other.

text.name: info-power-Super Strength-Clobber
text.label: Information
text.text: The character pummels their foe with enough force to knock them flat.

text.name: info-power-Super Strength-Ground-Shaking Stomp
text.label: Information
text.text: The character smashes the ground so hard the earth trembles.

text.name: info-power-Super Strength-Quick Toss
text.label: Information
text.text: The character tosses a person like a toy.

text.name: info-power-Super Strength-Smash
text.label: Information
text.text: SMASH!

text.name: info-power-Super Strength-Unrelenting Smash
text.label: Information
text.text: The character smashes everything in reach.

text.name: info-power-Tactics-Advance
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can advance their allies on the battlefield.

text.name: info-power-Tactics-Battle Plan
text.label: Information
text.text: The character always has a plan.

text.name: info-power-Tactics-Change of Plans
text.label: Information
text.text: The character thinks of a better way.

text.name: info-power-Tactics-Combat Support
text.label: Information
text.text: The character gives a friend a hand.

text.name: info-power-Tactics-Focus Fire
text.label: Information
text.text: The character calls out a target.

text.name: info-power-Tactics-Hit the Dirt
text.label: Information
text.text: The character gets their allies to take cover.

text.name: info-power-Tactics-Keep Moving
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can keep allies moving under fire.

text.name: info-power-Tactics-On Your Feet
text.label: Information
text.text: The character stands their friends on their feet.

text.name: info-power-Tactics-Operations Center
text.label: Information
text.text: The character directs their allies in combat.

text.name: info-power-Tactics-Rally On Me
text.label: Information
text.text: The character rallies their friends around them.

text.name: info-power-Tactics-Scatter
text.label: Information
text.text: The character warns allies to take evasive action.

text.name: info-power-Telekinesis-Group Levitation
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can lift others into the air too.

text.name: info-power-Telekinesis-Levitation
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can hover and move.

text.name: info-power-Telekinesis-Telekinetic Attack
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can punch or choke an enemy with their mind.

text.name: info-power-Telekinesis-Telekinetic Barrier
text.label: Information
text.text: The character forms a protective barrier with their mind.

text.name: info-power-Telekinesis-Telekinetic Crush
text.label: Information
text.text: The character mentally squeezes a foe.

text.name: info-power-Telekinesis-Telekinetic Grab
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can grab a foe with their mind.

text.name: info-power-Telekinesis-Telekinetic Manipulation
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can handle physical things with their mind.

text.name: info-power-Telekinesis-Telekinetic Protection 1
text.label: Information
text.text: The character uses their mind to physically protect themselves.

text.name: info-power-Telekinesis-Telekinetic Protection 2
text.label: Information
text.text: The character toughens their mind against physical damage.

text.name: info-power-Telekinesis-Telekinetic Protection 3
text.label: Information
text.text: The character's mind protects them like a tank.

text.name: info-power-Telekinesis-Telekinetic Protection 4
text.label: Information
text.text: The character's mind protects them like a fortress.

text.name: info-power-Telekinesis-Telekinetic Reinforcement
text.label: Information
text.text: The character reinforces their defenses with their mind.

text.name: info-power-Telekinesis-Telekinetic Sphere
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can create a protective sphere with their mind.

text.name: info-power-Telekinesis-Telekinetic Toss
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can throw a foe around with their mind.

text.name: info-power-Telepathy-Animal Bond
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can communicate with an animal friend.

text.name: info-power-Telepathy-Animal Communication
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can communicate with a type of animal.

text.name: info-power-Telepathy-Astral Form
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can enter the Astral Plane.

text.name: info-power-Telepathy-Borrow Senses
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can use another person's senses.

text.name: info-power-Telepathy-Cloak
text.label: Information
text.text: The character makes people believe they're not there.

text.name: info-power-Telepathy-Cloak Group
text.label: Information
text.text: The character mentally hides themselves and their friends.

text.name: info-power-Telepathy-Command
text.label: Information
text.text: The character forces someone to follow an order.

text.name: info-power-Telepathy-Domination
text.label: Information
text.text: The character forces someone to follow their orderspermanently.

text.name: info-power-Telepathy-Edit Memory
text.label: Information
text.text: The character alters someone's memory.

text.name: info-power-Telepathy-ESP
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can sense the presence of others.

text.name: info-power-Telepathy-Fool
text.label: Information
text.text: The character makes people believe they are someone else.

text.name: info-power-Telepathy-Grand Fool
text.label: Information
text.text: The character mentally makes the group they're with appear to be like other people.

text.name: info-power-Telepathy-Grand Mirage
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can make a mirage appear in a groups mind.

text.name: info-power-Telepathy-Information Upload
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can transmit loads of information straight into anothers mind.

text.name: info-power-Telepathy-Machine Telepathy
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can communicate with machines with their mind.

text.name: info-power-Telepathy-Memory Blip
text.label: Information
text.text: The character erases a bit of someone's memory.

text.name: info-power-Telepathy-Mental Punch
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can blast a foe's mind in melee.

text.name: info-power-Telepathy-Mental Shelter
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can create a shelter for their mind.

text.name: info-power-Telepathy-Mind Interrogation
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can root through a target's mind.

text.name: info-power-Telepathy-Mind Reading
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can read thoughts.

text.name: info-power-Telepathy-Mirage
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can make mirages appear in a target's mind.

text.name: info-power-Telepathy-Orders
text.label: Information
text.text: The character forces someone to follow a complex set of orders.

text.name: info-power-Telepathy-Telepathic Blast
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can mentally blast a foe's mind.

text.name: info-power-Telepathy-Telepathic Link
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can speak with another telepathically.

text.name: info-power-Telepathy-Telepathic Network
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can speak telepathically with a group of people.

text.name: info-power-Telepathy-Telepathic Possession
text.label: Information
text.text: The character mentally takes over someone else's body.

text.name: info-power-Teleportation-Blink
text.label: Information
text.text: The character teleports a short distance away.

text.name: info-power-Teleportation-Blink Barrage
text.label: Information
text.text: The character teleports rapidly around an opponent.

text.name: info-power-Teleportation-Blink Defense
text.label: Information
text.text: The character teleports a short distance away.

text.name: info-power-Teleportation-Teleport 1
text.label: Information
text.text: The character teleports someplace else.

text.name: info-power-Teleportation-Teleport 2
text.label: Information
text.text: The character teleports great distances.

text.name: info-power-Teleportation-Teleport Blind
text.label: Information
text.text: The character teleports someplace new to them.

text.name: info-power-Teleportation-Teleport Object
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can teleport something else with them.

text.name: info-power-Teleportation-Teleport Other
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can teleport someone else away.

text.name: info-power-Teleportation-Teleport Together
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can teleport someone they are touching.

text.name: info-power-Teleportation-Teleportal
text.label: Information
text.text: The character opens a portal to another place.

text.name: info-power-Weather Control-Control Fog
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can create or dispel a thick fog.

text.name: info-power-Weather Control-Control Weather 1
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can make it rain.

text.name: info-power-Weather Control-Control Weather 2
text.label: Information
text.text: The character can make it storm.

text.name: info-power-Weather Control-Control Weather 3
text.label: Information
text.text: The character creates a thunderstorm.

text.name: info-power-Weather Control-Control Weather 4
text.label: Information
text.text: The character generates a hurricane.

text.name: info-power-Weather Control-Thunder
text.label: Information
text.text: The character causes a deafening crack of thunder.

text.name: info-power-Weather Control-Weather Chill
text.label: Information
text.text: The character cools things down.

text.name: info-power-Weather Control-Weather Warm
text.label: Information
text.text: The character heats things up.
